Hello,

my name is Ola.

I am a Front End Development enthusiast living in Warsaw.

01About Me

I have to put a real heading here

I was always interested in communication between people. Front end development is a means of communication both between people and between computers.

I feel sick and tired of hearing that my ideas cannot be realised due to technical limitation. While complaining about joyless tools I had to use at work I always thought that I would do it somehow better. Slowly I started to believe that I can really do it in a better way - more intuitive, more elegant, smarter and even cleaner and better coded. I decided I give it a go. I will try to przekwalifikowac sie

Everything started on Python course at my previous work. Since that time I have been learning how to code and it is just over a year now. I attended two very short programming courses, but I am mostly a self-taught developer.

Currently I am looking for a job on Junior Front End Developer position.

The aim of this project was to get more familiar with Date object and some CSS3 properties such as box-shadow, text-shadow, border-radius, animations and CSS variables. I wanted also to use any other Web Fonts that Google Fonts to practise using @font-face.
